code: import React from'react';import{Link,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import'./Header.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=()=>{const location=useLocation();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"logo",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Go + React App"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"nav",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:location.pathname==='/'?'nav-link active':'nav-link',children:"\u0413\u043B\u0430\u0432\u043D\u0430\u044F"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/users",className:location.pathname==='/users'?'nav-link active':'nav-link',children:"\u041F\u043E\u043B\u044C\u0437\u043E\u0432\u0430\u0442\u0435\u043B\u0438"})]})]})});};export default Header;
